install.name: JCal Client Latest Events
install.author: Anything Digital
install.description: "Latest Events" module for the JCal Client calendar component. NOTE that this module has some parameters, such as the number of events to display at once, which you can change here in Administration by going to Modules, selecting Site Modules and selecting JCal Pro Latest Events.

param.name: calendar
param.label: Calendar
param.description: Calendar name to show. Leave blank for all.

param.name: categories
param.label: Categories
param.description: Ids of JCal Pro categories to show (comma seperated). Leave blank for all.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: number_of_events_to_list_upcoming
param.label: Number of Upcoming Events to List
param.description: This just says how many upcoming events to list in the module.

param.name: number_of_events_to_list_recent
param.label: Number of Recent Events to List
param.description: If set to zero, it will ONLY show upcoming events. Otherwise the module will show this many past events under a separate heading.

param.name: title_max_length
param.label: Maximum Displayed Length of Event Title
param.description: Enter a number. Any event listed with a title longer than that number will be shortened and a '...' appended.

param.name: show_times
param.label: Show Event Times?
param.description: If 'no' then the event time will not be displayed.

param.name: show_calendar
param.label: Show Calendar Name?
param.description: If 'yes' then the calendar name appears after event name.

param.name: show_dates
param.label: Show Event Dates?
param.description: If 'no' then the event date will not be displayed.

param.name: show_category
param.label: Show Category Name?
param.description: If 'yes' then the category name appears in parentheses.

param.name: show_description
param.label: Show Event Description?
param.description: If 'yes' then the description will appear.

param.name: show_contact
param.label: Show Contact Information?
param.description: If 'yes' then the contact info will appear.

param.name: description_max_length
param.label: Max Displayed Length of Event Description
param.description: Enter a number. Any event listed with a description longer than that number will be shortened and a '...' appended.

param.name: strip_bbcode_from_description
param.label: Strip BBCode From Description?
param.description: If 'yes' then any BBCode tags, like bold and italic, will be stripped out in the module. If 'Defer' is picked, it will use the JCal Pro component settings for 'Allow HTML in event descriptions'

param.name: show_recurrent_events
param.label: Show Recurring Events?
param.description: If 'yes' then recurring events will each be listed separately. If 'Defer' is picked, it will use the JCal Pro component settings for 'Show recurrent events.'

param.name: output
param.label: Output Type
param.description: The type of HTML output

param.label: HTML code to separate events
param.description: If you have 'Number of Recent Events to List' set to anything other than zero, this is what the heading will be for Recent Events.
param.name: event_separator
show_month_separators
param.label: Show Month Separators?
param.description: If 'yes' then events will be grouped by month, with a label.

param.name: month_separator_style
param.label: CSS Style for Month Separator
param.description: List any CSS style properties, separated by semicolons, that will apply to the month separator if you selected 'yes' above.
param.default: background-color: none; border-top-color: #777777; border-bottom-color: #777777; border-top-width: 1px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold; margin: 4px; text-align: center

param.name: no_upcoming_events_text
param.label: Text if No Upcoming Events Found
param.description: If you selected 'yes' above for 'Display Module if No Events Exist?', this is the text that will be displayed when no upcoming events are found. HTML is permitted.
param.default: There are no upcoming events currently scheduled.

param.name: recent_events_text
param.label: Title for 'Recent Events'
param.description: If you have 'Number of Recent Events to List' set to anything other than zero, this is what the heading will be for Recent Events.

param.name: recent_events_style
param.label: CSS Style for 'Recent Events' Separator
param.description: List any CSS style properties, separated by semicolons, that will apply to the heading for 'Recent Events' above.
param.default: font-size: 130%; font-weight: bold; background-color: none; border-top-color: #333333; border-bottom-color: #333333; border-top-width: 2px; border-bottom-width: 2px; border-top-style: solid; border-bottom-style: solid; margin: 10px; text-align: center

param.name: show_full_calendar_link
param.label: Show 'View Full Calendar' Link?
param.description: If 'yes' then a link appears taking you to the full calendar component.

param.name: full_calendar_link_text
param.label: 'View Full Calendar' link text
param.description: Whatever you want the link to say instead of 'View Full Calendar'

param.name: show_add_event_link
param.label: Show 'Add New Event' Link?
param.description: If 'yes' then a small link appears below the events list to add a new event.

param.name: add_event_text
param.label: 'Add New Event' link text
param.description: Whatever you want the link to say instead of 'Add New Event'

param.name: use_extcal_locale_settings
param.label: Use JCal Pro Locale Setting?
param.description: 'No' should probably be fine. But if your months and days are in the wrong language, try 'yes'--but first make sure the locale code is correct in your Site Configuration!

param.name: time_format_12_or_24
param.label: 12 or 24-hour Time Display
param.description: Tells module whether to use 12-hour or 24-hour time.

param.name: days_view
param.label: Days view
param.description: Tells module whether to use date string or x days.

param.name: date_format
param.label: Date Format
param.description: Date format string per PHP strftime function.

param.name: component_itemid
param.label: Specific Itemid for displaying the module
param.description: Fill this option in case you want minical to open within a specific menu option. Left blank otherwise .
